title: Bug 48384globalXsltFile parameter for the DefaultServlet
EB: When overriding the DefaultServlet for a given application, the globalXsltFile path need to be relative to Tomcat root.for example:<initparam<paramnameglobalXsltFile</paramname<paramvaluewebapps/quercus/WEBINF/listing.xsl</paramvalue</initparamit would be nice if the path could be relative to the application context.
